panels.description: total number of transactions in mempool

targets.expr: sum by ( instance) (aptos_core_mempool_index_size{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", index="system_ttl"})

panels.title: Mempool size

panels.description: total number of transactions in mempool

targets.expr: avg(aptos_core_mempool_index_size{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", index="system_ttl"})
quantile(0.5, aptos_core_mempool_index_size{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", index="system_ttl"})
quantile(0.9, aptos_core_mempool_index_size{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", index="system_ttl"})
quantile(0.99, aptos_core_mempool_index_size{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", index="system_ttl"})
quantile(0.1, aptos_core_mempool_index_size{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", index="system_ttl"})

panels.title: Mempool size (summary)

panels.description: number of live peers a node can broadcast to in each network

targets.expr: sum by (instance, network) (aptos_mempool_active_upstream_peers_count{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region"})

panels.title: Active Upstream Peers

panels.description: total size in bytes of transactions in mempool

targets.expr: sum by ( instance) (aptos_core_mempool_index_size{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", index="size_bytes"})

panels.title: Mempool size (bytes)

panels.description: The time between Mempool receiving the transaction and time to be committed.

targets.expr: avg(rate(aptos_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_sum{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", stage="commit_accepted"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_count{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", stage="commit_accepted"}[$interval]))

max(rate(aptos_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_sum{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", stage="commit_accepted"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_count{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", stage="commit_accepted"}[$interval]))

quantile(0.5, rate(aptos_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_sum{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", stage="commit_accepted"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_count{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", stage="commit_accepted"}[$interval]))

quantile(0.9, rate(aptos_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_sum{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", stage="commit_accepted"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_count{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", stage="commit_accepted"}[$interval]))

quantile(0.1, rate(aptos_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_sum{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", stage="commit_accepted"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_count{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", stage="commit_accepted"}[$interval]))

panels.title: (deprecated) Avg E2E Txn Commit Latency

panels.description: The time between Mempool receiving the transaction and time to be committed.

targets.expr: sum by (bucket) (rate(aptos_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_sum{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", stage="commit_accepted"}[$interval])) / sum by (bucket) (rate(aptos_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_count{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", stage="commit_accepted"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Per Bucket Avg E2E Txn Commit Latency

targets.expr: sum by (instance) (rate(aptos_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_sum{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", stage="commit_accepted", submitted_by="client"}[$interval])) / sum by (instance) (rate(aptos_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_count{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", stage="commit_accepted", submitted_by="client"}[$interval]))

panels.description: Transactions that were submitted from downstream, and not from a peer validator

panels.title: Validator E2E Txn Commit Latency

panels.description: The time between Mempool receiving the transaction and time to be committed.

targets.expr: sum by ( instance) (rate(aptos_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_sum{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", stage="commit_accepted"}[$interval])) / sum by ( instance) (rate(aptos_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_count{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", stage="commit_accepted"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Avg Insertion-to-Block-Timestamp

panels.description: The time between the local Mempool receiving the transaction and time to be committed.

targets.expr: sum by (instance, bucket) (rate(aptos_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_sum{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", stage="commit_accepted"}[$interval])) / sum by (instance, bucket) (rate(aptos_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_count{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", stage="commit_accepted"}[$interval]))

panels.description: rate of new transactions received from other peers or JSON-RPC

targets.expr: sum by (instance, network, sender) (rate(aptos_shared_mempool_transactions_processed{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Received

panels.description: rate of transactions that were successfully validated before mempool insertion

targets.expr: sum by (instance, network, sender) (rate(aptos_shared_mempool_transactions_processed{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", status!="vm_validation"}[$interval]))

panels.title: VM Validation Succeeded

panels.description: rate of submitted txns that failed to pass the VM validation

targets.expr: sum by (instance, network, sender) (rate(aptos_shared_mempool_transactions_processed{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", status="vm_validation"}[$interval]))

panels.title: VM Validation Failed

panels.description: rate of mempool insertion of txn

targets.expr: sum by (instance, status) (rate(aptos_shared_mempool_transactions_processed{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", status="success"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Insertion Succeeded

panels.description: rate of transactions that passed VM validation but were rejected from mempool

targets.expr: rate(aptos_shared_mempool_transactions_processed{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", status!="success", status!="vm_validation"}[$interval])

panels.title: Insertion Failed

panels.description: Rate at which duplicate (idempotent) txns are received at mempool

targets.expr: rate(aptos_core_mempool_idempotent_txns_count{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region"}[$interval])

panels.title: Duplicate (Idempotent)

panels.description: Rate at which txns are removed (via commit) from mempool

targets.expr: rate(aptos_core_mempool_removed_txns_count{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region"}[$interval])

panels.title: Removal Rate

panels.description: rate of accepted committed transactions (notified from consensus)

targets.expr: rate(aptos_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_count{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", stage="commit_accepted"}[$interval])

panels.title: Commit Accepted

panels.description: rate of rejected committed transactions (notified from consensus)

targets.expr: rate(aptos_mempool_service_transactions_sum{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", type="commit_rejected"}[$interval])

panels.title: Commit Rejected

panels.description: rate of number of transactions that expired in mempool based on client-specified expiration time

targets.expr: rate(aptos_core_mempool_gc_latency_count{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", type="client_expiration"}[$interval])

panels.title: Client-expired

panels.description: Rate of number of transactions that expired in mempool based on mempool-specified expiration time

targets.expr: rate(aptos_core_mempool_gc_latency_count{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", type="system_ttl"}[$interval])

panels.title: System-expired

targets.expr: rate(aptos_core_mempool_gc_eager_expire_event_count{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region"}[$interval])

rate(aptos_core_mempool_gc_eager_expire_event_count{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_core_mempool_gc_eager_expire_non_parked_count{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region"}[$interval])

panels.description: rate of transactions broadcasted to other peers

targets.expr: rate(aptos_shared_mempool_transaction_broadcast_sum{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region"}[$interval])

panels.title: Broadcast Rate

panels.description: average number of transactions in a single broadcast

targets.expr: rate(aptos_shared_mempool_transaction_broadcast_sum{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_shared_mempool_transaction_broadcast_count{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region"}[$interval])

panels.title: Average Broadcast Size

panels.description: average time b/w broadcast sent and ACK coming back for it

targets.expr: rate(aptos_shared_mempool_broadcast_roundtrip_latency_sum{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_shared_mempool_broadcast_roundtrip_latency_count{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region"}[$interval])

panels.title: Average Broadcast Roundtrip Time

panels.description: avg time it takes to execute a broadcast

targets.expr: rate(aptos_mempool_broadcast_latency_sum{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_mempool_broadcast_latency_count{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region"}[$interval])

panels.title: Average Broadcast Execution Latency

panels.description: rate of broadcasts that are retrying past broadcasts that received a retry ACK

targets.expr: rate(aptos_shared_mempool_rebroadcast_count{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", type="retry", instance=~"$instance", role=~"role"}[$interval])

panels.title: Retry Rebroadcast

panels.description: avg number of broadcasts / sec

targets.expr: rate(aptos_mempool_broadcast_latency_count{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region"}[$interval])

panels.title: Broadcast Rate (requests/s)

panels.description: rate of broadcasts that are retrying expired braodcasts (that did not get back an ACK in window of time)

targets.expr: rate(aptos_shared_mempool_rebroadcast_count{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", type="expired"}[$interval])

panels.title: Expired Rebroadcast Rate

panels.description: number of sent broadcasts awaiting an ACK

targets.expr: sum by (instance, network) (aptos_shared_mempool_pending_broadcasts_count{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region"})

panels.title: Pending Broadcasts

panels.description: rate of broadcasts that were executed as a backpressure broadcast

targets.expr: rate(aptos_shared_mempool_rebroadcast_count{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", type="backpressure"}[$interval])

panels.title: Backpressure Broadcast

panels.title: Bucketed Ranking Score (Remove)

targets.expr: sum by (instance, bucket) (rate(aptos_core_mempool_txn_ranking_bucket{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", stage="broadcast_ready"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Bucketed Ranking Score (Broadcast Ready)

panels.description: Rate of broadcast batched transactions per ranking score bucket

targets.expr: sum by (instance, bucket) (rate(aptos_core_mempool_txn_ranking_bucket{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", stage="broadcast_batched"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Bucketed Ranking Score (Broadcast Batched)

panels.description: Rate of removed transactions per ranking score bucket

targets.expr: sum by (status, bucket) (rate(aptos_core_mempool_txn_ranking_bucket{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", stage="remove"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Bucketed Ranking Score (Remove) - Sum

panels.description: The time between Mempool receiving the transaction and time to be committed.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.10, sum by (instance, le) (rate(aptos_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_bucket{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", stage="commit_accepted"}[$interval])))

panels.title: p10

panels.description: The time between Mempool receiving the transaction and time to be committed.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (instance, le) (rate(aptos_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_bucket{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", stage="commit_accepted"}[$interval])))

panels.title: p50

panels.description: The time between Mempool receiving the transaction and time to be committed.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (instance, le) (rate(aptos_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_bucket{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", stage="commit_accepted"}[$interval])))

panels.title: p90

panels.description: Average size of consensus blocks pulled from mempool

targets.expr: rate(aptos_mempool_service_transactions_sum{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", type="get_block"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_mempool_service_transactions_count{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", type="get_block"}[$interval])

panels.title: Block size

panels.description: Average size in bytes of consensus blocks pulled from mempool

targets.expr: rate(aptos_mempool_service_bytes_get_block_sum{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_mempool_service_bytes_get_block_count{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region"}[$interval])

panels.title: Block size in bytes

panels.description: Avg time it takes for consensus to pull block from mempool

targets.expr: rate(aptos_mempool_service_latency_ms_sum{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", type="get_block", instance=~"$instance"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_mempool_service_latency_ms_count{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", type="get_block", instance=~"$instance"}[$interval])

panels.title: Avg latency for get_block

panels.description: Rate of accepted transactions committed per second (notified from state sync)

targets.expr: rate(aptos_mempool_service_transactions_sum{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", type="commit_accepted"}[$interval])

panels.title: Commit Succeeded

panels.description: Rate of accepted transactions committed per second (notified from state sync)

targets.expr: rate(aptos_mempool_service_transactions_sum{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", type="commit_rejected"}[$interval])

panels.title: Commit Rejected

panels.description: rate of shared mempool events from peers

targets.expr: rate(aptos_shared_mempool_events{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region"}[$interval])

panels.title: Incoming events rate

panels.description: Duration of each run of the event loop

targets.expr: rate(aptos_mempool_main_loop_sum{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_mempool_main_loop_count{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region"}[$interval])

panels.title: Main loop latency

panels.description: average time it takes for mempool to start an async task

targets.expr: rate(aptos_mempool_bounded_executor_spawn_latency_sum{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", stage="start"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_mempool_bounded_executor_spawn_latency_count{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", stage="start"}[$interval])

panels.title: Shared Mempool Task Start Latency

panels.description: avg time it takes to VM-validate txns in a submission

targets.expr: rate(aptos_mempool_process_txn_breakdown_latency_sum{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", portion="vm_validation"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_mempool_process_txn_breakdown_latency_count{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", portion="vm_validation"}[$interval])

panels.title: Average VM Validation Latency

panels.description: latency of db read when validating transaction

targets.expr: rate(aptos_mempool_process_txn_breakdown_latency_sum{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", portion="storage_fetch"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_mempool_process_txn_breakdown_latency_count{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", portion="storage_fetch"}[$interval])

panels.title: Average DB Read Latency

panels.description: avg time it takes to process incoming transactions, per incoming submission

targets.expr: rate(aptos_shared_mempool_request_latency_sum{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_shared_mempool_request_latency_count{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region"}[$interval])

panels.title: Average Txn Processing Latency

panels.description: average time it takes for mempool to process a commit of accepted transactions (sent from state sync)

targets.expr: rate(aptos_mempool_service_latency_ms_sum{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", type="commit_accepted"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_mempool_service_latency_ms_count{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", type="commit_accepted"}[$interval])

panels.title: Avg latency handle commit (accepted)

panels.description: avg time it takes to process committed rejected txns

targets.expr: rate(aptos_mempool_service_latency_ms_sum{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", type="commit_rejected"}[$interval])/rate(aptos_mempool_service_latency_ms_count{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", type="commit_rejected"}[$interval])

panels.title: Avg latency handle commit (rejected)

panels.description: number of times core mempool invariant was violated

targets.expr: rate(aptos_mempool_core_mempool_invariant_violated_count{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", instance="$instance", role="$role"}[$interval])

panels.title: Core Mempool Invariant Violation

panels.description: number of timeouts on a mempool service request (from consensus/state sync)

targets.expr: rate(aptos_mempool_service_latency_ms_count{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", result="fail"}[$interval])

panels.title: Mempool Service Timeout

panels.description: number of times a DB error occurred

targets.expr: rate(aptos_mempool_db_error_count{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region"}[$interval])

panels.title: DB error

panels.description: number of timeouts in callback to JSON RPC

targets.expr: rate(aptos_mempool_json_rpc_callback_fail_count{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region"}[$interval])

panels.title: JSON RPC Callback Timeout

panels.description: number of times a aptos network send failed

targets.expr: rate(aptos_mempool_network_send_fail_count{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region"}[$interval])

panels.title: Network Send Fail

panels.description: number of times reconfiguration of VM failed

targets.expr: rate(aptos_mempool_vm_reconfig_update_fail_count{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region"}[$interval])

panels.title: VM Reconfiguration Failure

panels.description: rate of retry/backpressure ACKs received

targets.expr: rate(aptos_shared_mempool_ack_count{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", direction="received"}[$interval])

panels.title: ACKs Received

panels.description: rate of unexpected network messages received

targets.expr: rate(aptos_mempool_unexpected_network_count{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region"}[$interval])

panels.title: Unexpected Network Messages

panels.description: rate of backoff/retry ACKs sent

targets.expr: aptos_shared_mempool_ack_count{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", direction="sent"}

panels.title: Sent ACKs (backoff/retry)

panels.description: Number of times garbage-collection event occurred (regardless of how many txns were actually removed in the event)

targets.expr: rate(aptos_core_mempool_gc_event_count{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", type="system_ttl"}[$interval])

panels.title: Garbage Collection Event Rate

panels.description: how long a transaction stayed in mempool before being garbage-collected

targets.expr: rate(aptos_core_mempool_gc_latency_sum{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region"}[$interval])/rate(aptos_core_mempool_gc_latency_count{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region"}[$interval])

panels.title: GC Latency

panels.description: Messages currently queued to be sent out

targets.expr: sum by (instance) (aptos_mempool_pending_network_events{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", state="enqueued"}) - sum by (instance)  (aptos_mempool_pending_network_events{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", state="dequeued"})

panels.title: Messages Queued

panels.description: rate of messages being enqueued to be sent out

targets.expr: rate(aptos_mempool_pending_network_events{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", state="enqueued"}[$interval])

panels.title: Messages Enqueued Rate

panels.description: Rate of messages dequeued from mempool network sender

targets.expr: rate(aptos_mempool_pending_network_events{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", state="dequeued"}[$interval])

panels.title: Messages Dequeued Rate

panels.description: number of messages dropped from mempool channel sender

targets.expr: aptos_mempool_pending_network_events{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region", state="dropped"}

panels.title: Dropped Messages
